full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS LA BRTEN NAS NOR DANG TSE DPAL DGE MTSAN 'GUGS PA'I CHO GA BUM SGRUB DANG BCAS PA DNGOS GRUB 'DOD DGU'I CHAR CHEN 'BABS PA'I BDEN TSIG DBYAR GYI RDE SANGS ZHES BYA BA BI HA RA,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @034A *, ,(CES RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS LA BRTEN NAS NOR DANG TSE DPAL DGE MTSAN 'GUGS PA'I CHO GA BUM SGRUB GSER SKYEMS CHOGS 'KHOR ZHAR BYUNG DANG BCAS PA DNGOS GRUB 'DOD DGU'I CHAR CHEN 'BEBS PA'I BDEN TSIG DBYAR GYI RDE GSANGS ZHES PA 'DI NI, ME PHAG STON DUS CHOS SDE CHEN PO SKYOR LUNG GRVA TSANG GNYIS DANG 'BRAS SPUNGS RGYAL BA SOGS LA GA-YANG 'GUGS BGYIS SKABS MOS PA'I RKYEN DANG DAD LDAN KHAG GIS BSKUL NGOR, GLING SPRUL RDO RJE 'CHANG DANG KHRI CHEN YONGS 'DZIN BKA' 'GYUR BA'I DRUNG NAS RNAM SRAS BSKOR GYI DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG ZANGS DKAR BU STON SKYOR LUNG PHYAG BA ZHES CHA TSANG THOB PA'I MANG THOS GYI NA PA SKYOR LUNG MKHAN 'DZIN BSKAL BZANG SKYE MING PAS PADMA KHANG BDE SKYID TSES GLING GI NYI 'OD DU BRIS PA YI GE'I 'DU BYAD TSE RING GA-YANG 'PHEL GYI BGYIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,DANG BAS DRAN PA TZAM LA'ANG ZAG MED KYI, CHOS 'BYOR YAR ZLA'I DPAL LTAR RGYAS MDZAD PA'I, ,SA BRGYAD DBANG PHYUG GNOD SBYIN NGAL BSOS PO, ,DGYES BYED PHYVA GA-YANG 'GUGS PA'I CHO GA 'DI, ,BKRAS KHANG SDE KHRI BYAMS PA MTHU STOBS NAS, PAR BSKRUN DGE TSOGS BDE GSHEGS BSTAN DAR ZHING, DE 'DZIN SPYI DANG ^RGYAL DBANG YAB SRAS KYI, ,ZHABS BRTAN MDZAD 'PHRIN RGYAS PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO, ,GZHAN YANG YUL KHAMS PADMA'I TSAL YANG POR, DAM CHOS MTHUN RKYEN 'DOD RGU SBRANG RTZI'I BCUD, ,SMIN LA LUS CAN BUNG BA'I 'PHUR LDING GIS, ,ROL BZHIN DGE MTSAN GLU DBYANGS SGROG GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,PAR 'DI RNAM GRVA SPYI SO SGANG DU BZHUGS, ,)
